sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="change_request"> <change_request action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <activity_due/> <additional_assignee_list/> <approval>approved</approval> <approval_history/> <approval_set/> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group display_value="Network" name="Network">287ebd7da9fe198100f92cc8d1d2154e</assignment_group> <backout_plan>Check the previous version of the switchport config in the configuration management database and revert</backout_plan> <business_duration/> <business_service/> <cab_date/> <cab_date_time/> <cab_delegate/> <cab_recommendation/> <cab_required>false</cab_required> <calendar_duration/> <category>Other</category> <change_plan/> <chg_model/> <close_code>successful</close_code> <close_notes>Closed successfully</close_notes> <closed_at>2015-07-06 14:22:05</closed_at> <closed_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</closed_by> <cmdb_ci/> <comments/> <comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <conflict_last_run/> <conflict_status>Not Run</conflict_status> <contact_type>phone</contact_type> <contract/> <correlation_display/> <correlation_id/> <delivery_plan/> <delivery_task/> <description>Change the port of a Cisco switch to a new VLAN. This would commonly occur when moving a server from one IP network to another.</description> <due_date/> <end_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_list/> <impact>3</impact> <implementation_plan>--Logon to the switch using SSH --Type the following commands  switch# configure terminal switch(config)# interface {type slot/port | port-channel number} switch(config-if)# switchport access vlan vlan-id  For example  switch# configure terminal switch(config)# interface Gi1/1 switch(config-if)# switchport access vlan 101  --Save the switch config file</implementation_plan> <justification/> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <number>CHG0000022</number> <on_hold>false</on_hold> <on_hold_reason/> <on_hold_task/> <opened_at>2015-07-06 14:20:38</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <outside_maintenance_schedule>false</outside_maintenance_schedule> <parent/> <phase>requested</phase> <phase_state>open</phase_state> <priority>4</priority> <production_system>false</production_system> <reason/> <reassignment_count>2</reassignment_count> <rejection_goto/> <requested_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</requested_by> <requested_by_date/> <review_comments/> <review_date/> <review_status/> <risk>3</risk> <risk_impact_analysis/> <route_reason/> <scope>3</scope> <service_offering/> <short_description>Change VLAN on a Cisco switchport</short_description> <sla_due/> <start_date/> <state>3</state> <std_change_producer_version display_value="Change VLAN on a Cisco switchport - 1">f1c8d15147810200e90d87e8dee490f9</std_change_producer_version> <sys_class_name>change_request</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-07-06 14:20:38</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>5d77b8da47410200e90d87e8dee49040</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-07-06 14:22:05</sys_updated_on> <task_effective_number>CHG0000022</task_effective_number> <test_plan>Run the "show vlan 101" command to view the new configuration (changing 101 for the correct VLAN number)</test_plan> <time_worked/> <type>standard</type> <unauthorized>false</unauthorized> <universal_request/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end>2015-07-06 14:21:53</work_end> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start>2015-07-06 14:21:50</work_start> </change_request> </record_update>
